property.name: QRCode
property.description-key: The contents of the QR Code

property.name: offlineMode
property.description-key: If offline mode is set to true the component will attempt to validate the COVID-19 Pass using a prefetched DID document, otherwise it will attempt to resolve the DID document from the MoH.

property.name: testMode
property.description-key: Allows you to set the control into test mode which will ensure that the sample QR code from https://nzcp.covid19.health.nz/#valid-worked-example will validate.

property.name: trustedIssuer
property.description-key: Can be used when control is in offline mode to supply trusted issuer id. DID Document property must also be set in this scenario.

property.name: didDocument
property.description-key: Can be used when control is in offline mode to supply static DID document JSON. Trusted Issue property must also be set in this scenario.

property.name: violationSection
property.description-key: Section of official specs under violation
